Load in data.

```{r load}
library(dplyr)
sites <- read.csv("197-raw_storage/shrub-volume-sites.csv")

```

## Combine Plots

```{r}
inner_join(expers, vols, by = "experiment") %>% 
  inner_join(sites, by = "site") -> d_table
  head(d_table)
```
